title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Usa will soon say all right guys thats enough.The biden gona say putin stop it and to china also lets stop it.That will make dollar go high and usa economic boom.Also russian gas and oil company valuation goes up and eu willl remove all the restrictions so we will have peace becouse biden will say we cant hurt the economy so its enough and money will flow freely again russia markets and eu and usa. And usa will remain even stronger also china apoligize about tawain.Markets turn bullishSoon the biden will say this:" its a madness whats going on around the world its bad for economy lets stop all or anyone who dont listen will be dealt by usa "Usa will going to save economy around the world also putin will stop everything from day one becouse everbody listening usa.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Can you explain in details how the US will solve the inflation because this is what giving the US dollar a hard time while the war is just worsening it. I’m not update on Joe Biden solution but I’m just basing my comment on the increasing CPI points every month.All the war that involves Russia and Ukraine is not directly involved US. How come Joe Biden will make it stop while they are not the direct opponent of this 2 countries. They already throw a lot of sanctions just to stop Russia but nothing happened. I’m interested  to know if you have a solid explanation on how you come up with this theory.

I’m interested  to know if you have a solid explanation on how you come up with this theory.Becouse usa is biggest guy on the block right now they show themselfes as weak becouse the smart ones the wall street ones want cheap usa dollars now.But every country listen usa otherwise usa will make justice if putin dont listen joe biden then nato and usa will simply invade all russia with few days and putin will look like next sadam hussen or ghadaffi.China well china cant even taken seriously china politicial leaders are alliance with usa biden is boss in china Hunter biden also is influential person nobody dont argue with them much.Inflation not problem usa can direct inflation of dollar to other country there is ways to do this.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: The op makes little sense. Biden argued that Putin must stop many times, and Putin didn't stop and is not planning to stop any time soon. China is in interdependent relations with the USA, but it also has some leverage, and China considers Taiwan its own territory, so it won't apologise for anything (while the US officially doesn't recognize Taiwan, by the way). Since the war won't stop so easily, sanctions won't stop either. Also, Russian gas and oil are barely under sanctions right now, and the EU is still paying a lot to get them, thus effectively sponsoring the war and helping it to last longer. Also, it's not like when the war stops, everything is suddenly well. Russia not only destroyed a lot of buildings in Ukraine, but also committed many war crimes, killed a lot of people. So paying for all that is also necessary, although, of course, no payment can bring back the people Russia killed. US will remain strong, with that I agree, but we're still in for a global recession, and the fact that China is alright with giving Russia tons of money for energy (China does not follow Western sanctions) means that China is actually in an advantageous position here, so its influence in comparison with the US might get bigger than it used to be.

China ? China never gona go against usa china will close eyes like nothing happens.So its simple the western allies are so strong its impossible to fight against them.And usa is leader and joe biden playing as weak old men but biden is actually smart and sharp minded guy even smarter then trump wasAlso biden get along with all the wrstern leaders well

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: You clearly have not seen what happened in the past. Its not that easy to stop with just a single command and like they are all under Biden. These wars were even easily prevented in the first place but weren't prevented just like Pelosi being warned. But the Pelosi already have financial crime are held by the neck so Pelosi can't do anything but to do what bosses wants despite the warning. See it could really be prevented from happening like in Ukraine with  Kamala.Think of it like your In-laws minding what you do in your house that's sort of what Pelosi did although seem unproductive really. They purposely meant to have war.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: You need to wake yourself up from dream, hallucinations and deep thinking to physical reality because that is never going to happen. Biden stopping the war? That won't happen because USA want to show superior to countries and Russia, China are part of the blocs giving a serious competition to them so stopping the war is to go back into uncertainty of superiority. The aspect of sale of arms also is a factor because when war is on some economies benefit from what arms they are producing for sell to countries in the war.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: They can't do anything but to somehow persuade people to save up and stop spending money and the inflation was not made by Putin, it was always there and covid made it much worse. If not for covid we'd have at least 5 more years of slow inflation in which governments would be able to slowly increase rates. Covid made people stay at home and save up for a while and then when everything opened up again they went back to spending with twice the force. Russia only managed to make worse things that were already bad.

comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on August 07, 2022, 12:51:58 PMUsa will soon say all right guys thats enough.The biden gona say putin stop it and to china also lets stop it.That will make dollar go high and usa economic boom.Good luck with this. The US is continuously agitating China by intervening indirectly in Taiwan by sending in Nancy Pelosi in there. China is no longer a country the US can bully. A lot of things has changed and I know you know that. Also, good luck with the Russians. They won't stand down until they reach their goal, or they deem it's no longer worth it to sustain their invasion of Ukraine. Quote from: 325btc on August 07, 2022, 12:51:58 PMAlso russian gas and oil company valuation goes up and eu willl remove all the restrictions so we will have peace becouse biden will say we cant hurt the economy so its enough and money will flow freely again russia markets and eu and usa. These three are fighting for the top spot in the world economy, and for sure the US will not initiate this 'peace treaty' even if they wanted to because they want to maintain their image as the firm and reliable ally that everyone needs.Quote from: 325btc on August 07, 2022, 12:51:58 PMAnd usa will remain even stronger also china apoligize about tawain.Markets turn bullishI love what you're smoking. China will never apologize for their transgressions, ever. They're only strong against terrorist forces, but aren't as intimidating when they're up against global superpowers like Russia and China.
